title: Chris Bryant – 2022 Comments on Government’s Plan to Send Asylum Seekers to Rwanda
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Chris Byrant, the Labour MP for Rhondda, on Twitter on 14 April 2022.
content: The PM is using the Rwanda plan to mask the fact that he’s the first occupant of Downing Street to get a criminal sanction. Pretty cynical really. Any plan should be announced to parliament first so it can face proper scrutiny.
The Rwanda plan will cost more than putting them up in the Ritz.
